scripts.build:docs: vite build && rm -rf docs/assets docs/images docs/index.html docs/og-image.png docs/profile.jpg && cp -r dist/* docs/
scripts.build:deploy: npm run build:docs && git add docs && git commit -m "Deploy: update docs from dist" || true
